title: Primetime Draven Audio Glitch
body:
I've noticed every Draven skin has a different sound effect for hitting the target with his Q "Spinning Axe". I've been playing Primetime Draven as it is one of my personal favorite skins, but recently the skin has been having the Sound Effect of Pool Party Draven's axes.
Should be an easy bug fix in next patch

replies.body:
Hey there! ^-^ 

Thanks for the report! I wrote up a ticket for this issue, so it's logged for sure. Unfortunately, we're wrapping up the build for the upcoming patch (6.22), so it's unlikely we'll be able to get the fix in for the next patch. We'll do our best to get the fix in ASAP, though. :)
It's not a bug tho. There was a change to his Q AA sound in 6.21, which doesn't fit the skin at all. Sound similar to Pool Party tho.
